price: 90਼ ਜੇ ਉਹ (ਮਰਨ ਵਾਲਾ) ਸੱਜੇ ਹੱਥ ਵਾਲਿਆਂ ਵਿੱਚੋਂ ਹੋਇਆ।
arabic: وَأَمَّآ إِن كَانَ مِنۡ أَصۡحَٰبِ ٱلۡيَمِينِ

version.title: Punjabi translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Punjabi by Arif Halim, published by Darussalam

meta.transliteration: wa-ammā in kāna min aṣḥābi al-yamīni
